summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the Mayor and the City Comptroller to execute and accept for and on behalf of The City of Seattle three permits from Burlington Northern, Inc., to construct, maintain and operate a 12-inch water pipe line with appurtenances across and along portions of said corporation's railroad right of way on the Lake Union and Sumas Branch Lines in the vicinity of West Ewing Street between 8th Avenue West and 13th Avenue West, Seattle, King County, Washington.
